channel.title: runes on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in runes on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Same first rune for Machida house
item.description: 20:05 Friday 25 December 2015 JST We selected just two runes this time: Overview: Appropriate action: So I took them to be saying “wait for a message”

item.title: travel resources and ROBS RUNES
item.description: Tuesday 21 October 1997 Today at work I mostly read The Pleiadian Agenda, and “Communities” magazine. And I surfed the web, starting with www.ic.org Intentional Communities page. In the past several weeks, I have been finding many diverse resources that will help with my trip! Backpackers.com, designed to give travelers an email address and forum for communication and resources American Youth Hostels, nonprofit organization dedicated to making travel possible for those on a budget through its low-cost, self-service network of accommodations Intentional Communities, an organizational network thingy of communities around the country And I’m excited!

item.title: 3 rune spread about my trip
item.description: 1 October 1997 Today I felt moved to consult my Runes about my travel plans, and how I am so excited and want to travel now! I did a 3 Rune spread. The first Rune (reading from right to left) describes the “overview of the situation;” the second Rune (center) identifies the “challenge;” and the third Rune (left) indicates the “course of action called for” I had selected Laguz, Eihwaz, and Sowelu
